title: QQ
body:
How do I learn what I am doing wrong when everyone getting mad at me is doing the same thing?

Makes this game harder then it needs to be

replies.body:
Learning doesn't come from others,

It comes from within.

*insert ~~Kung Fu~~ Insec Challenjour Lee Sin Montage*

It's the, eye of the tiger, wait Lee Sin is blind.


On the serious note, learning comes from your own observation and giving the cold shoulder to whoever decides to give non constructive criticism.

> [{quoted}](name=TeCoolMage,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=dhwF65hT,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-09-30T15:48:52.108+0000)

> Learning doesn't come from others,
> 
> It comes from within.

> *insert Kung Fu Challenjour Lee Sin Montage*

> It's the, eye of the tiger, wait Lee Sin is blind.
> 
> 
> On the serious note, learning comes from your own observation and giving the cold shoulder to whoever decides to give non constructive criticism.

It's the, eye of the tiger, wait Lee ~~Sin~~  Song is blind.

That is more people then I care to count atm
How many normal wins do you have? If you only have a few then just keep playing , do some research, and have fun, otherwise ask them what you should be doing and learn from your mistakes :)

> [{quoted}](name=nice guys,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=dhwF65hT,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-09-30T13:41:05.408+0000)
